org.teamfarce.mirch

Class MIRCH

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationAdapter
      • org.teamfarce.mirch.MIRCH
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener

    public class MIRCH
extends com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationAdapter
    MIRCH is used to generate all graphics in the program. It initialises the scenario generator and game state and provides all interactions with the back end of the program.

        public void render()
